translation_rules: padConcat({inventory_id, src_filename, orig_stand_id_1, orig_stand_id_2, ogc_fid}, {4,15,10,10,7}, {'x','x','x','x','x'}, '-', TRUE, TRUE)
description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID. Note that polyid in ON02 can have up to 19 characters. To trace back to the source polyon, we split this into two strings during loading, polyid_1_10, and polyid_11_20. Concatenating these and dropping any x characters will return the original polyid identifier.
Returns the geometry and validates if necessary. If valid geometry cannot be made error code is returned.
